posts.post_content:
Rookie image from 1911 of Alexander.

SOLD

[quote name="T206Jim" post=2195222]Price drop to $2,150[/QUOTE]

Jim,

Small suggestion.  Don't just show the reduced price in your last post, but then leave the original asking in the initial post.  I'd go back and edit the original post to also reflect the reduced sales price.  Someone may just look at the first post and original asking price, and then leave the thread not knowing the price has been dropped.

Nice silk by the way.
